description:
■Game Overview
There is no difficult storyline or complicated equipment in this game.
All you have to do is dash or jump to the right while blasting and smashing enemies.

If you destroy enemies quickly, you will get a combo and get a bonus to your score.
This bonus will help you to earn points. Wads of money are flying in the sky.
Aim for 1,000,000,000 points!

Even if you happen to be destroyed by the enemy, you will just go back to the beginning of the stage.
Your score will also be restored to what it was before the stage started, without penalty.
It is a kind design that allows you to try again and again.

2-player cooperative play is also supported.
You can also enjoy it with your friends and family!

This is a fun game.

Challenge
Find and collect hidden panels!
Secret messages! Can you get to the truth?
The higher the score, the shorter the clear time... Challenge the developer's record!

Mecha Operation
Gunzohg's basic weapon is a shot that can be fired in any direction.
The shot becomes a powerful grenade by the energy that accumulates over time.
Energy is also used for dashing and boosting in the air.
The use of energy is an important point.
Gunzohg is equipped with a super mode that allows the energy to be unlimited.
This means that Gunzohg in Super Mode is the most powerful!

And its fighting attack, which blasts away enemies and containers, is exhilarating!
However, if you run out of life, your Gunzohg will break.
Don't forget to protect yourself with a shield.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series BombMachine Gunzohg
intro:
Simple, exhilarating mecha action!
Destruction! Destroy! Let's destroy the Subete!
